column4: cant find my temp files anymore, anyone knows where they might be? if im watching utube there's always a .flv file in my tmp folder so i could save it. since i have ubuntu 10.10 i cant find them anymore, im on ff3
You could also add the add-on/extention to Firefox; it's called "UnPlug."
i dont know about it, what is it? (itz just that it was so easy to save everything from the temp folder)
It downloads and saves streaming content; like videos and such.
